title: How to confront a Grammar Nazi

replies.body: Confront.... comfort..... are you doing this on purpose?
It's hilarious how your FEK avatar actually fits this response. lol.
This needs to be a thing.

I'll just start typing in Spanish

''¿Pero amigo, que te pasa?  un error lo comete cualquiera, no seas asi'' :D

I'm just gonna... leave this here... this thing I read from another thread... for the hate...

>"This is a champion with a super powerful late game passive,
and she just out dueled a super early game champion
with half hp.
At lv5.
With only 2 stacks of passive.
Without any other factors (minions, teammates, turrents, etc.)"
>
>Wait a minute...
>
>"At lv5.
With only 2 stacks of passive.
Without any other factors (minions, teammates, turrents, etc.)"
>
>No...
>
>"Without any other factors (minions, teammates, turrents, etc.)"
>
>NO!
>
>"turre~~n~~ts"
>
>THERE IS NO **N** IN THE WORD TURRET!
>
>_ahem_
>
>On topic now...

Let the hate flow through you, people.
I will always pronounce it turrents
I asked for hate, and people downvoted. Mission accomplished.
I think you thought your thunk.
